Tool

NameSupport Vector Machine Classification (OpenCV)
ID7
AuthorO.Conrad (c) 2016
Specificationgrid

Description

Integration of the OpenCV Machine Learning library for Support Vector Machine classification of gridded features. Open Source Computer Vision
